last_episode_to_air.name: Verlossing II
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tom Segers gets suspended, but continues his investigation on Veerle Goderis. Believing his colleague is in serious danger, Lucas Neefs shares his dark secret with Esther Mathijs. Veerle however responds too quick, making Tom look his own death into the eye.

name: Zone Stad
overview: Zone Stad is a Flemish-Belgian TV series about a police-department located in Antwerp. In the series, police officers solve various crimes, which are shown as realistically as possible.

episodes.name: Rosse John
episodes.overview: Antwerp detective inspector Tom Segers and his partner Rob Biesemans have been after the drug gang of 'Rosse (i.e red-haired) John' for a long time. During a critical stake-out, they go in before reinforcements are properly in position, and Rob gets killed by Rosse. As if facing his buddy's widow and orphan weren't bad enough, Tom is under serious investigation by internal affairs. He's in no state to continue this investigation, and the 'two Jeans', uniformed patrol car partners, mistake another red-hair for the fiend. The only one who may deliver Rosse John to Tom ...

episodes.name: Vluchtmisdrijf
episodes.overview: Internal affairs examines his ex Katrien Meersman's staged rape claim against commissioner Wim Jacobs. The two Jeans are negligent when arresting a street vandal, one of them even looses his service gun; they decide to keep quiet, later must handle a father who threatens to drop his child from a deadly height unless the mother returns to him. Chief cares only for her daughters, victims of a hit and run; the eldest proves terminal. Tom and Danny give tracing the guilty car priority over a series of DVD thefts, but informer Ruige Ronny has an urgent tip to find Rosse ...

episodes.name: De huisjesmelker
episodes.overview: When Tom convinces the chief commissioner -whose husband Roy moves out 'to think about their relationship'- to raid a presumed whorehouse, they find it really houses illegals from Eastern Europe, possibly a case of 'modern slave trade' for prostitution. The two Jeans find a neighborhood terrorized by a youngsters' street gang, who scare possible witnesses out of testifying. Ivo fears he may have to leave to Antwerp PD to take care of his dementia-stricken wife. A jeweler reports his wife missing, she's found killed shortly after.

guest_stars.character: Oudere vrouw die te traag reed
guest_stars.name: Rita Smets

episodes.name: De Roemeen
episodes.overview: A jogger finds a naked young woman's corps, dead since days, killed on other soil, with multiple fractures and other wounds from elaborate torture. Snitch Ronny recognizes Ilena, one of the prostitutes in the Rumanian slaver's club Stars & Stripes, but the manager claims to be an unconnected owner; when another girl talks, she's run over... Thin Jean tries in vain to convince or threaten gay waiter Marcel into withdrawing his sexual harassment complaint against colleague fat Jean, but is only offered a 1,000 Euro pay-off; however he has a magic trick up his sleeve...

episodes.name: De engel des doods
episodes.overview: On Sunday, the Jeans follow a kidnapping- oops, an elopement. An ice hockey referee denies having hit a player causing a bloody nose in front of the crowd. The commissioner orders Tom to investigate the latest of 12 -usually frequent- deaths in a retirement home; autopsy confirms at least one was a result of poisoning by injection. The Antwerp Zoo director reports repeated vandalism, no break-in.

episodes.name: Tess vermist
episodes.overview: When Geertrui, a mother, is slashed in her home, Tom concentrates on her husband Renaat. He admits to have had an affair with office colleague Caroline, who went missing. Ruige reports his girlfriend Tess, the daughter of senator Verbesselt, has been missing for a week, but is shamelessly ignored as usual. Only after he finds out she has serious gambling debts, Tom takes an interest in what proves to be the major case.

episodes.name: Het huwelijk
episodes.overview: After a car hits student Jochen while out on his bike, a jeep refuses to stop and help his fiancée, but films the incident, which is later posted on Internet. When Ruige Ronny attends Tess's funeral, two sinister men threaten him to pay her gambling debts. The brass's instructions to stay on duty during Jean's gay marriage with Rudy are almost cheerfully ignored, even by newbie Gert.

episodes.name: Schijn bedriegt
episodes.overview: Hanging around conspiring criminals in a nightclub, sneaky snitch Ruige Ronny learns about a heist on an armed money transport, but while Tom is in the shower his hot date turns off his cellphone. Commissioner Wim Jacobs soon regrets having ignored Ronny's call when a violent attack on the road is reported to have caused spectacular damage. Next day, after the chief insists progress must be made in the hunt for Interpol-signaled, never trialled terrorist Sadun Hamudi, it takes all Dani's female charms and born bastard Tom's meanest persuasion by shameless threats to ...

episodes.name: De nieuwe
episodes.overview: As the zone chief realizes it will never click between Jean and bitch Gwenny (who exchanges jealous tantrums with her cohabiting lover, commissioner Wim Jacobs), she is transferred -again- to poor Stijn, while old dog Jean gets the new boy as partner: colored Jimmy N'Tonga, who worked a year in another Antwerp precinct. Inititally both burly boys are suspicious, Jimmy of Jean's gay reputation and possible racist tendency, but it soon becomes clear different backgrounds and perspectives can be useful when dealing with gay viz. ethnic minority civilians. Snitch Ruige ...

episodes.name: Babymoord
episodes.overview: An Antwerp supermarket cleaning lady finds a bloody baby corps in a toilet bin, asphyxiated. After watching security videos, Tom believes the mother is the woman who wore a masking wide jacket they find in a dumpster. Rudi remembers her, young Dorien Rooms, who declared the loss of her ID a few weeks earlier... Jean and George pick up a lifter in boxer shorts who was forced to strip in a Dutch car, which is chased, both perps are arrested. When Jacobs' SWAT team has accomplice Remco Maertens's house surrounded to catch drug dealer Soenens, the fiend holds a gun to ...

episodes.name: Wapensmokkel
episodes.overview: Tom and Dani are watching from the police-helicopter for a gum-ball trough the city. They see a Ferrari which drives too fast and send Jean en Jimmy. After an exciting chase it doesn't seem to be a normal offender. Meanwhile Gwennie is missing since a week. Wim is certain Tom has something to do with her disappearance. He's not the only one who thinks about it like that.

episodes.name: De zegelring
episodes.overview: Tom is suspended, being Internal Affairs's suspect for the disappearance of his cop party-flirt, Gwen Callens. The alternative theory, abuse by her steady friend commissioner Wim Jacobs, is as unpopular in the precinct. Jogger Patrick Ringoet (46) is run down, possibly in purpose, but by whom and why? Witte and Jean, who is jealous of his athletic body and bored with his diet, must stake-out a flasher in a Seniors city quarter.

episodes.name: De doorbraak
episodes.overview: Ronny proves very useful, tracing Gwen's signet ring's origin. Dani keeps looking, Tom gets drunk and refuses all collaboration with IA, which only makes him look more suspect. Jean and Jimmy are called in as witnesses when a man's apartment is opened, but find him murdered; tracing his suspicious, unemployed neighbour, they stumble across a presumed pedophile porn network. The search for Gwen Callens makes dramatic progress...

episodes.name: De ontvoering
episodes.overview: Dirk Verhulst, founding CEO of major Antwerp textile manufacturing company Texta, is kidnapped by two masked, armed men from his car before the eyes of his unharmed children, which he exceptionally drove to school at the insistence of his wife and firm's computer specialist Kristien Smekens. Commissioner Wim Jacobs' black-out defense seems even more hopeless now the fatal bullet is proven to be fired by his police pistol; Tom still doubts Wim's guilt but the prosecutor formally charges Wim and the chief suspends him. Jean and Jimmy investigate black African Tomani's ...

episodes.name: Verdwenen met de Noorderzon
episodes.overview: When Mrs. Lea Vanacker goes to the mayor complaining her report on the disappearance of her husband Renaat got no reply in three days, as the precinct is badly under-manned and Wim is in custody, the chief of police lectures the zone chief's managerial incompetence. Tom gets the case, Lea claims it must be murder by Renaat's business partner André Verboven, who would be romantically after her. André claims she is the seductress and an unbearable nagger, so he believes Renaat took another identity to flee the country with his mistress Els, about which he told Lea ...

episodes.name: Inbraakgolf
episodes.overview: Illegal construction worker Ivan Semberas falls to his death on an Antwerp wharf. His boss says he'll bring him to hospital himself, but the body is dumped besides a road, out of sight. Jimmy spots this, braving Jean's usual skepticism, but is in an unprecedented foul mood, even bitching at Rudy on the day of his demented wife's burial after her fatal fall in the rest home. Jimmy suddenly makes a huge problem of Jean's playful 'race related' pleasantries, but heroically singlehandedly prevents a drama when Belgian-born 'Moroccan' Rachid uses a knife to enforce ...

episodes.name: Lijk in het bos
episodes.overview: Now Wim Jacobs' case is closed, he asked and got his transfer to another police zone, so Tom Segers is promoted against his will to acting commissioner, an essentially administrative job, so he is most eager to get out investigating a case in the field. A mountain-biker finds a corps in the woods, with traces of wounding cuffing, several gun shots and bite marks. Tom guesses right it was a man hunt. The victim is a drug addict, who was saved from a theft conviction a few months earlier by his voluntary pro-deo lawyer Poortmans, whose hobby is hunting with hounds. The ...

episodes.name: Geïnfiltreerd
episodes.overview: Ruige Ronny enjoys a pheasant hunt with Poortmans' club, observed by Tom and Dani, who enjoy 'playing' a couple making out. Jean and Jimmy help a woman get her cat down and successfully follow up a anonymous tip about illegals in a sealed container on a ship to England. Willem Poleunis' wife, a nurse, is first missing, then found murdered in her car, burned out in the woods. He was cheated on and seems to be faking a alibi, but it turns out legit and there's another suspect very close. Ruige calls while snooping at the Dogvile kennel, when suddenly...

episodes.name: Manhunting
episodes.overview: Snitch Ruige Ronny is kept imprisoned in a cage together with a chained hound at Dogville, where he had been working to spy. Lawyer Poortmans cleverly covers his tracks with an antedated contract for the transfer of his animals to another firm, 'De Kluif' (Dutch for the Bone). When the corps commander hears Tom and Segers shadow the lawyer without authorization from the investigating magistrate, he orders them to cease and gives them another case, the disappearance of Gracienne Wuyts, daughter of a textile baron, according to her 30 year younger lover Diederik with ...

episodes.name: Schuld en boete
episodes.overview: The colleagues of Gerard Gijsbrechts find his body in a hangar. The man got under an agricultural machine and had no chance to survive. The cable ties that are found next to the machine, let Tom Segers suspect that the man was murdered. His partner Dani doesn't want to expel an accident or suicide. And especially not when Kathleen Mees -the colleague who founds his body- tells that Gijsbrechts was always alone, and when they discover a box of Prozac pills in his apartment. The autopsy makes everything clear: Gijsbrechts was murdered. Before they finds any clues ...

episodes.name: De spijkermoord
episodes.overview: Luc Geens is found dead in the storeroom of his do-it-yourself store. His forehead is pierced with a nail-pistol and next to his body a print of a sport-shoe gets found. Tom Segers is leading the investigation and his new police-partner Fien will feel it. The just graduated inspector doesn't get taken serious and gets not one single chance to prove herself. After a conversation with the victim's girlfriend, Tom is sure that Geens was killed by his son Bart. The boy had a fight with his father about money, and in his house they find the sport-shoe and a nail-pistol. ...

episodes.name: Dubbel spel
episodes.overview: While uniformed officer Mike is enjoying 'intimate services' in the harbor's prostitution quarter, he accidentally witness a brutal mugging. Trucker Marcel Liekens get beaten into hospital by a masked man and passerby Sven Raes who tries to save him is killed himself. Mike only reports it anonymously. Tom suspects both victims were attacked as closet-gays, based solely on a porn magazine, but desk work shows Liekens was in desperate debt since a disastrous traffic accident. The informer invites the cops, with freebies, to the opening of his strip bar. Forensic expert ...

episodes.name: De kleine prinses
episodes.overview: In Antwerp's grand Central Station, a baby is found, abandoned in a cardboard box. The poor quality-security camera recording shows only the time of abandon. Elise Huybrechts (15) is reported missing, the mother was partying all the previous evening and night; the problem seems rooted at home. Jimmy considers his partner Mike, always late on the job, useless, yet starts a petition against his suspension (ordered by the police chief). The chief also wants the early retirement of widowed desk officer Ivo, who has trouble handling modern equipment. However, Ivo thinks of...

episodes.name: Diamant
episodes.overview: Chassidic diamond trader Ariel Reuben is killed, shot in the head and chest. He was last seen by his assistant Benjamin Beer, who claims their Biblical faith keeps him calm, but he has no alibi. The chief declares that the case is top priority and insists Ivo must retire soon. He wants the case passed 'discretely' to the federal detectives - Tom gets a single day respite from his commissioner. Ariel's brother Simon, a cutter in the major firm of Kiril Simeon, asks for the widow's hand. Such 'Levitic' marriage is a traditional way to keep assets in the family. Lucas ...

episodes.name: Onzichtbaar
episodes.overview: Whilst the precinct prepares a retirement party for Ivo, who never wanted to be pensioned off, the commissioner scolds Tom for his affair with Kathy, but her husband Lucas assures him that poses no professional problem. Attorney and gambler Maarten Timmermans (30) is found shot through the heart outside the Antwerp 'palace of justice' (grand courthouse). Only two hours later manager Geert Dehondt (29) is shot with the same gun on the steps of his Meir (shopping square) bank branch, after failing to recognize the killer, a bitter Antwerp law school year friend. Ivo is ...

episodes.name: Horen, Zien en Zwijgen
episodes.overview: The very evening Antwerp prostitute Marishka breaks from her pimp, she's run over by a car and robbed. Autopsy shows she was killed by a prior knock on the head. Ivo, who died on field assignment for which the chief wants the commissioner severely sanctioned, gets a grand funeral. Snitch Ludo tells the alibi he was supposed to provide for Boris Joeratsjev, Marishka's Croat pimp and his bar's investor, is fake. Next Daisy, who told the police about Juracev's Eastern European 'girls supply', is beaten in hospital. At her accusation Tom arrests the pimp, who denies. ...

episodes.name: De Brouwerij
episodes.overview: Tom's youth friend Mark Debruyn's father is found hanging in their family brewery, actually a fake suicide. As sir distrusted Mark's selfish wife too much to turn over his CEO post and a P.I. delivered proof of her infidelity recently, suspicion falls on her. Nevertheless, a stupid prank Tom and Mark pulled years ago proves tragically relevant after another murder.

episodes.name: De Zondebok
episodes.overview: Convict Dirk De Vulder, a rapist-murderer Tom arrested, escapes during treatment for knife-wounds in hospital, murdering both police guards. His cell-mate of six years, murderer Benny Stassyns, claims he was unpopular but feared beyond bullying as a former para-commando. Tom blames himself for not having killed Dirk instead of taking him prisoner. Two weeks earlier, notary Bruno Cassiman transferred 20,000 Euro to Stassyns' account for an anonymous client, allegedly from an inheritance. Shortly after shopkeeper Van Mulkebeek, next to De Vulders ex's laundry shop, is ...

episodes.name: Baba Polley
episodes.overview: A party-goer, about to dive into the river for a swim, accidentally notices three African corpses floating in the Schelde (river Escaut). They didn't drown but suffocated in a container, illegals on a ship from Ghana. Hesitant surviving refugee Kofi, a self-declared Kenyan tells Jimmy that more Ghanese will arrive that day. Jimmy's Ghanean girlfriend feels 'discriminated' even by him when her father's bar isn't spared the intimidating interviews. She convinces him to keep quiet about wounded Ghanean refugee Kwami they know, who the next day turns up shot through the ...

episodes.name: Oog om Oog
episodes.overview: Lucas Neefs mobilizes the team urgently, having found after a night in bed with Fien that his young sons, one of which saw them, are missing. They went to former nanny Jadwiga's home, but she's found beaten to death there, besides a boy's cuddly toy. The team deduces an ex-con suspects shortlist, but Lucas initially keeps silent which one he recognizes and fails in a solo-rescue attempt. Yet fiend Tony Cuypers now demands a ransom, leading to a failed handover and a wild chase.

episodes.name: Full House
episodes.overview: Lascivious rock musician Jeff Nash went missing during his stay in an Antwerp luxury hotel. As a favor to the owner, the chief, as society friend, and acting commissioner Wim Jacobs arrange a discrete undercover investigation. Tom, whose ma discharged herself from hospital hoping he'll take her in, must play the bellhop, thus winning barman Robbie confidence. Fien plays a rich guest, flirting with Dutch big spender Marco Mulder. They thus attend the illegal poker nights for big stakes in a lounge closed for renovation, with a rich couple allegedly practicing 'open ...

episodes.name: Het Blijft in de Familie
episodes.overview: Handsome port policeman Robbe Meulemans's wife Mich Nelis is murdered and her corps dropped in the river after she left a yacht-club champagne party on notary Willem Sanders's yacht. Shortly after, the notary is murdered too. Robbe is shattered when the investigation reveals his wife's infidelity, yet his suicide by slitting his wrists in bath turns out staged again. Inheritance and family secrets prove crucial. Guy's attempted mutiny against Wim being instated as commissioner proves in vain.

episodes.name: De Gijzeling
episodes.overview: The team is called to a hostage situation in the Antwerp City Hall.

episodes.name: Welpen en Wolven
episodes.overview: Antwerp boy scout troop masters Max and Jelle Dhondt, brothers and Laurens report the disappearance of unpopular, difficult loner Bram, who was tied up near the rising stream for a game, or rather as implicit punishment. The team soon discovers there was more going on in the troop, involving girl scout Julie. More violence is at hand.

episodes.name: De laatste ronde
episodes.overview: A night-watcher of the Rubenhuis, Antwerp's splendid baroque museum, has been murdered at night. The intruder probably came trough a hatch to the old sewage system. Lucas is on FBI forensic training course. Team Tom works out the tensions between museum staff and the significance of selective theft from its un-exhibited paintings collection, both reaching back into history.

episodes.name: Het schilderij
episodes.overview: Sandrine Pauwels Pauwel throws out her husband Bert Nijs's things and him, then claims 40 year-old surgery professor Han Wuyts's car, which hits Bert on the road right there, meant to kill, although he got fatally injured himself. His widow, nurse Margot, denies he knew Bert and knows no enemies, nor did Han care for art, although his trunk contains a valuable painting by Lievens. His death cleared the way for his assistant Johan Beunis to be promoted and his anesthetist Vincent De Belder to run for rector (university chancellor). Autopsy shows his ribs were ...

episodes.name: De Zwarte Madonna
episodes.overview: Catholic curate René Delandsheer reports the theft of his parish church's valuable black Madonna. Most mentioned suspect is rascal Dede, of African descent. Shortly after, the boy is found under the bell tower after a fatal fall. But it was a mere fall down the stairs that killed him, so probably covered-up murder. After an old secret is found out, a confession is made, which Tom firmly disbelieves. Meanwhile Mike and Jimmy hunt down a fake uniformed cop.

episodes.name: Koud Geserveerd
episodes.overview: A possibly fake motorbike pizza deliverer beats Herman De Bruin cripple with an iron bar. Same MO fails to hurt nightclub bouncer Berre Verdonck. Openly promiscuous gay Sylvain Bosteels however is beaten to death. He extorted many small businesses by raising rent on the buildings he owned and accepted 'payment in kind' by hunky debtors, or in ugly pizzeria-owner Willy Peeters's case suggested his sexy son and deliverer Kevin. Tom meanwhile worries about his ma's possibly reviving affair with limping first-ever lover Marcel, and finds an apparent link.

episodes.name: Ontsnapt
episodes.overview: Two accomplices help Marc Vercruysse escape from a convict transport, perhaps the never recovered loot of a robbery five years ago. Guy checks on his disloyal girlfriend, Marc's brother Dirk, their mother and presumed gang mates, but several are killed shortly after. Back from his LA forensic training, Lucas Neefs learns Kathy cheated on him with Guy and keeps his boys from her, while the atmosphere at the precinct is grimly tainted. Mike is injured physically and Jimmy verbally while they investigate churchyard vandalism, but also save OD victim Davy Huybrechts.

episodes.name: Isoleercel
episodes.overview: While Peter Bruylands jogs in the Antwerp city park with his wife Barbara Van Dijck, his eyes are suddenly stabbed out by a masked assailant, who looses epilepsy pills while fleeing, apparently having failed to slit Peter's throat. While Jimmy and Mike stand guard at blinded Peter's hospital room, press photographer Ben Rijpens is allowed an interview. He tells how his son Jasper first lost the ability and later died after an accident and suddenly pierces Peter's ears, then escapes. Miranda Kuipers points out her daughter, photographer Anna, also has eyes and ears cut...

episodes.name: King of Skate
episodes.overview: Geoffrey 'King of Skate' Brouckaert makes a fatal fall during one of his daring stunts. Contractor Antoine Vermeer already has Geoffrey's rival Stan 'The Lord' Van Avermaet roughed up for intruding his construction site but has an alibi. Stan runs for the police, which leads to a crash landing him in hospital, but also has an alibi. Tom dares CSI Lucas for forensic evidence in the case and his lover's. When Fien tells her undercover lover Brik Delsing she's pregnant, he bluntly demands an abortion. Jimmy and amused Mike handle the case of Wouter Van Belle and his ex's...

episodes.name: De club
episodes.overview: Wealthy investment broker Paul Dewachter, who just invited Frederik for a hare dinner as new member of his investment club Croesus, finds his beloved Persian cat Arsalan skinned at home. Later a bomb explodes in his car. Tom discovers the at first sight happy family is a mess, including son Kristof, a cocaine addict. Bad investments have terrible consequences. Lucas accepts his boys want their mother and accepts a divorce. Fien considers what to do with Brik's baby.

episodes.name: De stille doder
episodes.overview: Tom's investigation of an apparent suicide soon focuses on a dodgy dentist. Meanwhile Tom assumes Lucas hired a P.I. to spy on him as part of his dirty divorce, but learns Lucas nobly puts his kids' interest first while the real culprit can't even offer a motive.

episodes.name: Vergeten
episodes.overview: While Guy and Annick Van Dijck are shopping independently in a mall, her two year-old son Robbe disappears, presumably kidnapped in his pram. Divorced father Jurgen Matthys is a rich entrepreneur, but no ransom is claimed, while he insists Annick's latest ex Michael Torfs must be a pedophile. Tom ignores the missing persons unit's jurisdiction. Commissioner Dani stands in as his partner now pregnant Fien is on desk duty. Suddenly Jurgen's sacked employee Dorien Vervoort turns up, claiming she has the toddler. Meanwhile Mike's moonlighting proves dangerous for him and ...

episodes.name: Verloren Zonen
episodes.overview: On the way to Tom's wedding, he and Mike witness how Jimmy is run over during an alcohol control by a speeding car driven by undercover Brik. Federal commissioner Wim Jacobs demands cooperation to catch Brik, whom he believed defected to Rodrigo Alva and son Dimitri Garcia's Russian synthetic drugs gang, which he infiltrated. Fien and Tom believe he's actually close to nailing the gang. Indeed he wins Rodrigo's trust, but brutish Dimitri is jealous.

episodes.name: Angel Tears
episodes.overview: Two teenagers find a substantial amount of drugs and decide to sell it in clubs. They do not know that drugs are part of a criminal transaction. The drug lord wants his wares back and opens the hunt for the teens. Soon there is a victim. Tom Segers and Fien Bosvoorde make an investigation. Meanwhile, there comes an alarming message at the office of Zone Stad. An unknown reports that he will commit suicide on the roof across the Oudaan.

episodes.name: De Aanslag
episodes.overview: The office of Zone Stad has been shot. A young agent was hit with serious injuries and is taken to the hospital. Was the student himself the target or was he at a bad time in the bad place? Tom Segers and Fien Bosvoorde want to find out and with their research the discover a web of prostitution and weapons. Meanwhile, a second attack follows.

episodes.name: Left Side Army
episodes.overview: In broad daylight a gun shop gets robbed. The perpetrators shoot the owner and steal a whole arsenal of weapons. The team of Zone Stad starts an investigation that brings them in the kick boxing environment. The sportive agent Mike Van Peel will infiltrate to solve the case.

episodes.name: Vuur/water
episodes.overview: A young man shoots on fire when he wants to light his cigarette. He dies of his injuries. If it appears that the victim was a fireman and later a fellow female firefighter is severely beaten, it is clear that it is not a coincidence. Tom Segers and Fien Bosvoorde start their search for the culprit in the fire station.

episodes.name: Rube Goldberg
episodes.overview: The famous architect and collector Johan De Bruyn is murdered with his own crossbow. It looks like a failed burglary. Tom Segers and Fien Bosvoorde leave this track when they find out that the wife of De Bruyn was cheating on him. The inspectors decide to sow discord between the lovers to solve the case.

episodes.name: Kruisweg
episodes.overview: Banker Peter and his housewife Chantal Mailleux report an unknown man's failed attempt to abduct kid daughter Marthe from their garden. The culprit is sound identified as Yannick Martens, boyfriend of their estranged adult daughter, prostitute Esther. Next day, Yannick is found murdered, skull smashed, and Esther claims Peter sexually abused his girls. Rivals Tom and Lucas suspect Esther's burly pimp, Axel Verlei, and her parents. More family secrets are unearthed. Meanwhile the crucial testimony against Maarten De Ryck, provided by his ex, is revoked. Tom's cockiness...

episodes.name: Rigor Mortis
episodes.overview: Courier firm driver Mario De Sutter died, apparently after loosing control of his vehicle. He has a bad record and a dodgy partner, fellow ex-con Luc Kemseke, his former robbery cahoot. Tom ignores his suspension until Dani overrules Lucas by converting it into psychiatric therapy with Dr. Inge Daems. The team soon finds each firm partner has been transporting a corps, however apparently not murdered, but secretly destined for surgeon Somers, who was fired for prescription trade from the hospital where Kemseke was a mortuary employee. Tom's illegal search compromising...

episodes.name: In het Duister
episodes.overview: Bart Decorte's wife Anne (35) is found knocked down with a golf-club while apprehending a nightly burglar and fatally strangled, however in the home of her divorced lover Rik Beernaert, whose daughter Merel ends up making a weird confession.

episodes.name: Fashion
episodes.overview: Antwerp fashion designer David Lemmens is fatally stabbed with scissors by a masked nightly intruder, who also vandalized colleague Jonas Vandevelde's collection in textile manufacturer Walter de Loneville's postgraduates institute's workshop. Jonas may have been the actual target, perhaps for scorned gay lover and sugar daddy Koen Deweerdt, who reveals David accused Jonas of stealing from his designs. Maarten now enjoys Fien's full trust, rudely disregarding warnings from Tom, Lucas and her pa. Walter had bisexual affairs and becomes the nearly blindly victim of an ...

episodes.name: Moeders en Hoeren
episodes.overview: Tom suspects Maarten De Ryck of the basement murder on a women looking alike Fien, she stands by her lover, who has an alibi. Plumber Patrick Libotte, Maarten wildest fan, makes a confession Fien chooses to believe, Lucas and Tom see trough. Tom hires Ruige to help investigate his father's death in the 1970s. Jimmy is finally recovered enough to return to duty, but feels guilty having developed his own substance problem.

episodes.name: Vriend of Vijand
episodes.overview: Violent gang leader Dimitri Alva is sprung from return back to jail after his appeal failed. After murdering front construction firm accomplice Petrus Thijssen, he concentrates on revenging his pa's death during a fight with Tom, who meanwhile continues digging into his own abusive lush pa's death. Mike saves Tom's life when trapped by a tip trough Ruige Ronnie. Commissioner Neefs can't get the team to leave things to the feds, even gets actively involved. Mike faces a dilemma when his lover's adolescent son Stijn in kidnapped to blackmail him.

episodes.name: Privé
episodes.overview: Informer Ruige calls a marker when he finds his sister raped and beaten into Intensive Care. As a harlot, her shady life is riddled with potential suspects. furthermore, the building includes some suspicious characters and was repeatedly robbed. Commissioner Neefs fails to cover up Fien's influential pa Jean-Yves Bosvoorde is the prime suspect, as she provides DNA test material, yet keeps trying to prove him innocent. Tom's memory is finally triggered concerning child-abuse by his lush dad Ray and the brute's traumatic end.

episodes.name: Black Mambas
episodes.overview: Fien visits Tom and asks him to go back to work. He refuses, definitely now he remembers that he killed his own father. Meanwhile Fien and Lucas are called to a motel room for a cruel double murder.

episodes.name: Toffe Pol
episodes.overview: In the middle of the night a young boy witnesses the murder of a prostitute. The next morning he is brought to the police station, after being found by a passerby. When little Lode makes a drawing of the murder, Tom and Fien start an investigation. Meanwhile Mike tells his colleague Jimmy that he is willing to get engaged. Jimmy also has big news: he will take part in the admission tests for the SWAT team. Tom thinks someone is planning to kill him.

episodes.name: Old School
episodes.overview: The janitor of the local soccer stadium discovers a body which hands were amputated post mortem. Tom and Fien think about a ritual murder or a link with Mexican drug cartels, but Lucas thinks they are looking to far. He meanwhile asks pathologist Lathouwers why Tom wants him to secretly investigate a weapon. Fien notices Tom has a growing drinking problem and warns him for the possible consequences.

episodes.name: Myositis
episodes.overview: Dirk Van de Vijver is trapped blindfolded in a basement. When his business partner Carl Verswyfelt receives a envelop carrying one of Dirk's fingers and a letter which requests 200,000 euros ransom, Tom and Fien are put on the case. They soon discover that Van de Vijver embezzled money from different clients and think maybe one of them is now using this cruel way to get his or her money back. Meanwhile Lucas asks Jimmy to spy on Tom in order to find out more about his private investigation.

episodes.name: Gouden Handschoen
episodes.overview: Soccer trainer Franky De Maeyer gets beaten into coma in the locker room. Fien stands alone when she is called to the scene, because Tom prefers spending his free time with Inez. Fien discovers Franky must have felt himself threatened, as he had recently requested a gun permission. But who was after him and why? Lucas confronts Tom with his private investigation. Mike is once again doing shady businesses and fears that it will now only take hours for his colleagues to find out.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: While Marijke Wijnant is taking a shower, her boyfriend Kris Vervecken gets brutally killed in their living room. Both worked as officers in the army and so Tom and Fien go to the barracks to look for a starting point. They soon find one in person of Dieter Landuyt, a newcomer who felt humiliated after his baptism by "the fantastic four", a group of close friends consisting of Kris and his colleagues Steven, Rudy and Bruno. Meanwhile Seppe tells Inez that the Alva-clan needs a new leader after the death of Rodrigo and Dimitri.

episodes.name: Smeergeld
episodes.overview: A man is firmly gagged in a car which gets deliberately pulverized. Tom and Fien discover the car was stolen one week ago in Kiev, but have no idea on the identity of the victim and the reason to kill him. Jimmy has a date with a beautiful girl he met on Facebook. Tom gets extremely angry towards Lucas.

episodes.name: Parkour
episodes.overview: Jimmy witnesses an accident, when two street jumpers cause a car crash, leaving a single mother to die. Tom and Fien visit Stef Vertongen, the Sports Council, in order to get the names of the local street jumpers. Just when he is about to talk, Vertongen gets blackmailed and decides not to cooperate. Dani takes a decision about her relationship with Maxime. Today is the big day for Mike and Els, but at their wedding they get an unexpected visit.

episodes.name: Bruiloftsklokken
episodes.overview: A night watchman of the Antwerp port is shot to death. His boss Herman Arco tells Tom and Fien that his daughter Stephanie and her fiancé live in the neighborhood. However, the couple declares to have heard nothing. When Tom and Fien catch longshoreman Ruud Deckers taking a load of cocaine outside a container, they think they have solved the case. But after taking the man in custody, a second murder takes place.

episodes.name: Wiedergutmachung
episodes.overview: When the night guard of a museum gets murdered, Tom and Fien start an investigation. They soon discover that they are not only looking for a murderer, but also an art thief. Tom and Inez get back together while Fien continues her private investigation on her partner's girlfriend. Meanwhile Lucas notices weird things are going on.

episodes.name: Kermis
episodes.overview: After a fairground entertainer gets murdered, the team heads to the local fair to start an investigation. Already during the first interrogations, the murderer makes a second victim. Meanwhile Inez has a relationship with Tom as well as Lucas. Tom gets desperate and tells Inez he knows about her secret. Lucas also has made a discovery and plans to get rid of Tom.

episodes.name: Insh'Allah
episodes.overview: After the emotional funeral of Fien, her father hands over an overlooked piece of evidence to Jimmy. Tom Segers and his new partner Esther Mathijs investigate the dead of Muslim refugee Arijan. He was killed when his house exploded, right after his converted wife Katrien and their baby went out.

episodes.name: Fucking Clowns
episodes.overview: Jimmy can't believe his ears when he discovers Lucas's commitment in the dead of Fien, and urges him to go report himself. Meanwhile the police team is busy checking on the Antwerp taxi drivers, because it seems that one of them has brutally raped multiple of his female negroid clients.

episodes.name: Baby Browning
episodes.overview: The whole team is shocked by the dead of Jimmy N'Tongo. Mike however refuses to believe his police partner has committed suicide. Tom Segers and Esther Mathijs interrogate a jeweler family, after a young man got shot with a rare gun. They claim not to be involved, until the police discover the man knew their son.

episodes.name: Love Boat
episodes.overview: A young girl is murdered during an orgy in a local sex club. Between the crowd, her father recognizes one familiar face, who could have been involved in the girl's death. At the police station Tom Segers starts suspecting his partner Esther Mathijs of being an infiltrator for the Internal Affairs Department.

episodes.name: Suicide is easy
episodes.overview: Tom Segers witnesses a bank robbery. One of the culprits proves to be a patient of Veerle Goderis. In the meantime the concerns of Lucas have changed into happiness, now his ex wife Kathy has returned into his life. Veerle however develops a plan to get rid of her.

episodes.name: Onder Voorwendsel
episodes.overview: The death of Kathy is a great shock for Lucas as well as Tom. At the police station Roel Swinnen, the substitute for the suspended Mike Van Peel, is introduced. The team tries to hunt down a man who attacks single women in their own house.

episodes.name: Hartenjager
episodes.overview: A young drug dealer is found strangled next to the local disco. His gay lover states he has nothing to do with the story, but the police soon find out the opposite. However, a second murder places everything in a totally different perspective. In the meantime Veerle keeps stalking Lucas.

episodes.name: Final Countdown
episodes.overview: After a female army officer walks in with a time bomb around her neck, the whole police station is evacuated. She survives after the payment of a 50,000 Euro ransom, but soon the culprit tries to harm another of her colleagues as well. Together with the motive, the police find out a secret about inspector Roel Swinnen.

episodes.name: Oude Liefde
episodes.overview: The cruel murder of a prostitute leads Tom Segers and Esther Mathijs to the environment of Didier Franckx, the pimp that has been betrayed by the female inspector during an undercover operation. Franckx however proves not to be an easy catch.

episodes.name: Burgerwacht
episodes.overview: The local neighborhood watch tips the police about the robbery on a Turkish electronics seller. Tom Segers and Esther Mathijs soon have their suspects, until a second robbery and even a murder bring up new motives. Didier Franckx meanwhile starts stalking Esther.

episodes.name: Verrijzenis
episodes.overview: The police investigate two strange disappearances: during the night the remains of an elderly woman were excavated from the cemetery, and only half a day later someone stole the body of the old governor out of the morgue. Didier meanwhile kidnaps Esther's daughter.

episodes.name: Verlossing I
episodes.overview: After another alleged suicide by one of Veerle's patients, Tom Segers start to put the pieces together. He is shocked when medical examiner Lathouwers also finds a connection to the death of Jimmy N'Tongo and Kathy Vanparys. The mask of Lucas Neefs slightly falls off.

episodes.name: Verlossing II
episodes.overview: Tom Segers gets suspended, but continues his investigation on Veerle Goderis. Believing his colleague is in serious danger, Lucas Neefs shares his dark secret with Esther Mathijs. Veerle however responds too quick, making Tom look his own death into the eye.
